item.title: Publication
item.description: 2021 Ramaravind Kommiya Mothilal, Divyat Mahajan, Chenhao Tan and Amit Sharma. Towards Unifying Feature Attribution and Counterfactual Explanations: Different Means to the Same End. In Proceedings of the Fourth AAAI/ACM conference on Artificial Intelligence, Ethics, and Society (AIES'2021); also presented at the Reponsible AI workshop at ICLR. Madhusudhan Aithal Mahabhaleshwara and Chenhao Tan. On Positivity Bias in Negative Reviews. In Proceedings of the Joint Conference of the 59th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics and the 11th International Joint Conference on Natural Language Processing (ACL-IJCNLP 2021) (short paper).
